definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before
to deserve praise for one's courage (idiom)
dew point/(coll.) (of a woman) to expose one of the three areas (nipples and genitals)
to feel hatred/to harbor a grudge
to play the fool (idiom)/to feign madness
to go dining, wining, whoring and gambling/to lead a life of dissipation
(of fruit etc) fresh/(of a person etc) full of life/healthy-looking/(of eyes) moist and bright/lustrous
to go far/to escape to faraway places
to shave the whole head clean/crushing defeat
to be an irksome presence (i.e. sth or sb one wishes were not there)
to defend sb (a relative, friend or oneself) despite knowing that that person is in the wrong
